displayProperties.description: Few weapons have withstood the test of time longer than the trusty SUROS Regime. This is Golden Age tech brought to life by the fastidious engineers at SUROS. Its smart-matter frame is prized among Guardians for both efficiency and rarity. Some things never fall out of fashion.
displayProperties.name: SUROS Regime

subtitle: Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.
